message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $950,000.  I believe this reflects its worth while leaving room for a beneficial agreement between us.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the opportunity to purchase the product.  While I understand its value, $950,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time.  I'm willing to pay $850,000.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the price.  While $850,000 is a bit too low for me to accept, I'm willing to come down to $900,000 to make this a win-win for both of us.
